# Comprehensive Test Plan: Practice Automated Testing Website

## Test Plan Information
**Website URL**: https://practiceautomatedtesting.com  
**Date Created**: 2025-11-22  
**Test Framework**: Selenium + Pytest  
**Browser**: Chrome (latest)  
**Generated by**: Selenium MCP Server

---

## 1. Overview

This comprehensive test plan covers all major sections of the Practice Automated Testing website:
- **Home Page** - Landing page and navigation
- **Web Elements** - Interactive form elements and controls
- **Shopping Application** - E-commerce functionality
- **API Section** - API testing documentation and endpoints
- **AI Tools** - AI-powered testing tools
- **Authentication** - Login functionality
- **UI Features** - Theme toggle and responsive design

---

## 2. Test Environment Setup

### Prerequisites
- Python 3.8+
- Selenium WebDriver
- Pytest framework
- Chrome browser
- Internet connection

### Configuration
- Base URL: `https://practiceautomatedtesting.com`
- Implicit wait: 10 seconds
- Explicit wait timeout: 15 seconds
- Screenshot on failure: Enabled

---

## 3. Test Scenarios

### 3.1 Home Page Tests

#### TC-HOME-001: Verify Homepage Loads
**Priority**: High  
**Description**: Verify the homepage loads successfully

**Steps**:
1. Navigate to https://practiceautomatedtesting.com
2. Wait for page to load completely
3. Verify page title is "Home"
4. Verify main navigation menu is visible

**Expected Results**:
- Page loads without errors
- Title displays correctly
- Navigation menu contains: Home, Web Elements, API, Shopping, AI Tools

---

#### TC-HOME-002: Verify Navigation Links
**Priority**: High  
**Description**: Verify all navigation links work correctly

**Steps**:
1. Navigate to homepage
2. Click each navigation link:
   - Home
   - Web Elements
   - API
   - Shopping
   - AI Tools
3. Verify each page loads correctly

**Expected Results**:
- All navigation links are clickable
- Each link navigates to correct page
- Page titles update appropriately

---

#### TC-HOME-003: Verify Call-to-Action Buttons
**Priority**: Medium  
**Description**: Test all CTA buttons on homepage

**Steps**:
1. Navigate to homepage
2. Verify presence of CTA buttons:
   - "Get Started"
   - "Start Learning →"
   - "Go to API Section →"
   - "Explore Shopping App →"
   - "Explore AI Tools →"
3. Click each button and verify navigation

**Expected Results**:
- All CTA buttons are visible and clickable
- Each button navigates to appropriate section

---

### 3.2 Shopping Application Tests

#### TC-SHOP-001: Add Single Product to Cart
**Priority**: Critical  
**Description**: Verify user can add a product to shopping cart

**Steps**:
1. Navigate to Shopping section
2. Verify initial cart shows "0 items" and "$0.00"
3. Click "Add to Cart" button on first product
4. Verify cart updates to "1 item"
5. Verify cart total price updates correctly

**Expected Results**:
- Cart count increases to 1
- Cart total shows product price
- Cart icon updates immediately

---

#### TC-SHOP-002: Add Multiple Products to Cart
**Priority**: Critical  
**Description**: Verify multiple products can be added to cart

**Steps**:
1. Navigate to Shopping section
2. Add 3 different products to cart
3. Verify cart count shows "3 items"
4. Verify cart total equals sum of product prices

**Expected Results**:
- Cart count increments correctly for each product
- Total price calculates accurately
- All products are tracked in cart

---

#### TC-SHOP-003: Category Filter
**Priority**: High  
**Description**: Verify product category filtering

**Steps**:
1. Navigate to Shopping section
2. Note total number of products displayed
3. Select "Electronics" from category dropdown
4. Verify only electronics products are displayed
5. Repeat for other categories:
   - Accessories
   - Office Supplies
   - Furniture
6. Select "All" and verify all products display again

**Expected Results**:
- Category dropdown lists all categories correctly
- Filtered results show only products from selected category
- "All" option displays all products

---

#### TC-SHOP-004: Price Range Filter
**Priority**: High  
**Description**: Verify price range filtering functionality

**Steps**:
1. Navigate to Shopping section
2. Verify default min price is $14.99
3. Verify default max price is $199.99
4. Set min price to $50.00
5. Set max price to $150.00
6. Verify displayed products are within price range
7. Check that no products outside range are shown

**Expected Results**:
- Price filters accept valid numeric input
- Products filter correctly based on price range
- All displayed products fall within specified range

---

#### TC-SHOP-005: Rating Filter - 5 Stars
**Priority**: Medium  
**Description**: Verify 5-star rating filter

**Steps**:
1. Navigate to Shopping section
2. Click "5★" rating filter button
3. Verify only 5-star rated products display
4. Verify product count updates correctly

**Expected Results**:
- Filter activates (button shows active state)
- Only 5-star products are visible
- Product count reflects filtered results

---

#### TC-SHOP-006: Rating Filter - 4 Stars
**Priority**: Medium  
**Description**: Verify 4-star rating filter

**Steps**:
1. Navigate to Shopping section
2. Click "4★" rating filter button
3. Verify only 4-star rated products display

**Expected Results**:
- Only 4-star products are visible
- Filter works independently

---

#### TC-SHOP-007: Rating Filter - 3 Stars
**Priority**: Medium  
**Description**: Verify 3-star rating filter

**Steps**:
1. Navigate to Shopping section
2. Click "3★" rating filter button
3. Verify only 3-star rated products display

**Expected Results**:
- Only 3-star products are visible

---

#### TC-SHOP-008: Multiple Rating Filters
**Priority**: Medium  
**Description**: Verify multiple rating filters can be combined

**Steps**:
1. Navigate to Shopping section
2. Click "5★" and "4★" rating filters
3. Verify products with 4 or 5 stars are displayed
4. Click "All" to clear filters

**Expected Results**:
- Multiple filters can be selected simultaneously
- Results show products matching any selected rating
- "All" button clears all rating filters

---

#### TC-SHOP-009: Sort by Name Ascending
**Priority**: High  
**Description**: Verify products sort alphabetically by name

**Steps**:
1. Navigate to Shopping section
2. Click "Sort by Name ▲" button
3. Capture product names in order
4. Verify names are in ascending alphabetical order

**Expected Results**:
- Products re-order alphabetically (A-Z)
- Sort indicator shows ascending order (▲)

---

#### TC-SHOP-010: Sort by Name Descending
**Priority**: High  
**Description**: Verify products sort reverse alphabetically

**Steps**:
1. Navigate to Shopping section
2. Click "Sort by Name" button twice to get descending order
3. Verify names are in descending alphabetical order (Z-A)

**Expected Results**:
- Products re-order in reverse alphabetical order
- Sort indicator shows descending order (▼)

---

#### TC-SHOP-011: Sort by Price Ascending
**Priority**: High  
**Description**: Verify products sort by price (low to high)

**Steps**:
1. Navigate to Shopping section
2. Click "Sort by Price" button
3. Extract all product prices
4. Verify prices are in ascending order

**Expected Results**:
- Products re-order by price (lowest first)
- Price sorting is accurate

---

#### TC-SHOP-012: Sort by Price Descending
**Priority**: High  
**Description**: Verify products sort by price (high to low)

**Steps**:
1. Navigate to Shopping section
2. Click "Sort by Price" button twice
3. Verify prices are in descending order (highest first)

**Expected Results**:
- Products re-order by price (highest first)

---

#### TC-SHOP-013: Pagination - Page 1
**Priority**: Medium  
**Description**: Verify pagination displays first page correctly

**Steps**:
1. Navigate to Shopping section
2. Verify "Page 1" button shows active state
3. Count products displayed on page 1
4. Verify expected number of products (typically 5 per page)

**Expected Results**:
- Page 1 is active by default
- Correct number of products display

---

#### TC-SHOP-014: Pagination - Page 2
**Priority**: Medium  
**Description**: Verify navigation to page 2

**Steps**:
1. Navigate to Shopping section
2. Click "Page 2" button
3. Verify page 2 products load
4. Verify "Page 2" button shows active state
5. Verify different products than page 1

**Expected Results**:
- Page 2 loads successfully
- New products are displayed
- Active page indicator updates

---

#### TC-SHOP-015: Pagination - Next Page Button
**Priority**: Medium  
**Description**: Verify "Next page" button functionality

**Steps**:
1. Navigate to Shopping section
2. Note current page (Page 1)
3. Click "Next page" button
4. Verify navigation to Page 2
5. Click "Next page" again if available

**Expected Results**:
- "Next page" navigates to subsequent page
- Button disabled on last page

---

#### TC-SHOP-016: Product Search
**Priority**: High  
**Description**: Verify product search functionality

**Steps**:
1. Navigate to Shopping section
2. Locate search input field
3. Enter product name (e.g., "laptop")
4. Press Enter or click search button
5. Verify search results display matching products

**Expected Results**:
- Search input accepts text
- Results filter based on search query
- Products match search term

---

#### TC-SHOP-017: Combined Filters
**Priority**: High  
**Description**: Verify multiple filters work together

**Steps**:
1. Navigate to Shopping section
2. Select category: "Electronics"
3. Set price range: $50-$150
4. Select rating: 5★
5. Verify only products matching ALL criteria display

**Expected Results**:
- All filters apply simultaneously
- Results match all filter criteria
- Product count updates correctly

---

#### TC-SHOP-018: Cart Persistence
**Priority**: Medium  
**Description**: Verify cart persists across page navigation

**Steps**:
1. Navigate to Shopping section
2. Add 2 products to cart
3. Navigate to Home page
4. Return to Shopping section
5. Verify cart still shows 2 items and correct total

**Expected Results**:
- Cart data persists during session
- Cart count and total remain accurate

---

### 3.3 Web Elements Tests

#### TC-WE-001: Simple Input Form - Text Input
**Priority**: High  
**Description**: Verify text input field accepts input

**Steps**:
1. Navigate to Web Elements section
2. Click on "Simple Input Form" or similar
3. Locate text input field
4. Enter text: "Test Automation"
5. Verify text appears in field

**Expected Results**:
- Input field accepts text
- Text displays correctly
- Input is stored properly

---

#### TC-WE-002: Simple Input Form - Textarea
**Priority**: High  
**Description**: Verify textarea accepts multi-line input

**Steps**:
1. Navigate to Web Elements section
2. Locate textarea element
3. Enter multi-line text
4. Verify text displays with line breaks

**Expected Results**:
- Textarea accepts multi-line input
- Line breaks are preserved

---

#### TC-WE-003: Simple Input Form - Submit
**Priority**: High  
**Description**: Verify form submission

**Steps**:
1. Navigate to Web Elements section
2. Fill in all form fields
3. Click Submit button
4. Verify form submission success message or confirmation

**Expected Results**:
- Submit button is clickable
- Form submits successfully
- Confirmation appears

---

#### TC-WE-004: Checkbox - Single Selection
**Priority**: High  
**Description**: Verify checkbox can be checked/unchecked

**Steps**:
1. Navigate to Checkbox section
2. Verify checkbox is initially unchecked
3. Click checkbox to check it
4. Verify checkbox shows checked state
5. Click again to uncheck
6. Verify checkbox is unchecked

**Expected Results**:
- Checkbox toggles between checked/unchecked
- Visual state updates correctly

---

#### TC-WE-005: Checkbox - Multiple Selection
**Priority**: High  
**Description**: Verify multiple checkboxes can be selected

**Steps**:
1. Navigate to Checkbox section
2. Check multiple checkboxes
3. Verify all selected checkboxes remain checked
4. Uncheck one checkbox
5. Verify others remain checked

**Expected Results**:
- Multiple checkboxes can be checked simultaneously
- Each checkbox operates independently

---

#### TC-WE-006: Radio Button - Single Selection
**Priority**: High  
**Description**: Verify only one radio button can be selected at a time

**Steps**:
1. Navigate to Radio Button section
2. Select first radio button
3. Verify it is selected
4. Select second radio button
5. Verify first radio button is now deselected
6. Verify second radio button is selected

**Expected Results**:
- Only one radio button selected at a time
- Previous selection automatically deselects

---

#### TC-WE-007: Web Table - Display Data
**Priority**: Medium  
**Description**: Verify web table displays data correctly

**Steps**:
1. Navigate to Web Tables section
2. Verify table is visible
3. Verify table headers are present
4. Verify table rows contain data
5. Count number of rows and columns

**Expected Results**:
- Table renders correctly
- Headers are clearly labeled
- Data is properly formatted in cells

---

#### TC-WE-008: Web Table - Read Cell Data
**Priority**: Medium  
**Description**: Verify ability to read specific cell data

**Steps**:
1. Navigate to Web Tables section
2. Identify specific cell (e.g., row 2, column 3)
3. Extract cell value
4. Verify value is readable and correct

**Expected Results**:
- Cell data can be located and extracted
- Data matches expected format

---

#### TC-WE-009: Links - Internal Link
**Priority**: Medium  
**Description**: Verify internal links work correctly

**Steps**:
1. Navigate to Links section
2. Identify internal link (same domain)
3. Click link
4. Verify navigation to correct page within site

**Expected Results**:
- Link is clickable
- Navigates to correct internal page
- Stays within same domain

---

#### TC-WE-010: Links - External Link
**Priority**: Medium  
**Description**: Verify external links open correctly

**Steps**:
1. Navigate to Links section
2. Identify external link
3. Click link
4. Verify link opens in new tab (if target="_blank")
5. Verify correct external URL loads

**Expected Results**:
- External link opens appropriately
- Correct URL is loaded

---

#### TC-WE-011: Select Dropdown - Single Selection
**Priority**: High  
**Description**: Verify dropdown selection functionality

**Steps**:
1. Navigate to Select Box section
2. Click dropdown to open options
3. Verify list of options appears
4. Select an option
5. Verify selected option displays in dropdown

**Expected Results**:
- Dropdown opens on click
- Options are visible and selectable
- Selected value displays correctly

---

#### TC-WE-012: Select Dropdown - Multiple Options
**Priority**: Medium  
**Description**: Verify all dropdown options are selectable

**Steps**:
1. Navigate to Select Box section
2. For each option in dropdown:
   - Select the option
   - Verify it becomes selected
   - Verify dropdown value updates

**Expected Results**:
- All options can be selected
- Dropdown value updates for each selection

---

#### TC-API-003: Try It Out - REST Endpoint

2. Locate first "Try It Out" button
3. Click button
4. Verify API request form or interface appears
5. Verify ability to send test request

**Expected Results**:
- "Try It Out" button is functional
- Interactive API testing interface appears
- Can execute test API calls

### 3.5 Authentication Tests

#### TC-AUTH-001: Navigate to Login Page
**Priority**: High  
**Description**: Verify login page is accessible

**Steps**:
1. From any page, locate "Login" link
2. Click "Login" link
3. Verify login page loads

**Expected Results**:
- Login link is visible in navigation
- Login page loads successfully

---

#### TC-AUTH-002: Login Form Elements
**Priority**: High  
**Description**: Verify login form contains required elements

**Steps**:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Verify presence of:
   - Username/Email input field
   - Password input field
   - Submit/Login button
   - Any additional elements (Remember me, Forgot password, etc.)

**Expected Results**:
- All login form elements are present
- Elements are properly labeled

---

#### TC-AUTH-003: Valid Login
**Priority**: Critical  
**Description**: Verify user can login with valid credentials

**Steps**:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter valid username/email
3. Enter valid password
4. Click Login button
5. Verify successful login (redirect or welcome message)

**Expected Results**:
- Login succeeds with valid credentials
- User is redirected to appropriate page
- Login state is maintained

**Test Data**: (Use appropriate test credentials)

---

#### TC-AUTH-004: Invalid Login - Wrong Password
**Priority**: High  
**Description**: Verify error message for incorrect password

**Steps**:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter valid username
3. Enter incorrect password
4. Click Login button
5. Verify error message displays

**Expected Results**:
- Login fails
- Appropriate error message shows
- User remains on login page

---

#### TC-AUTH-005: Invalid Login - Wrong Username
**Priority**: High  
**Description**: Verify error for non-existent username

**Steps**:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter non-existent username
3. Enter any password
4. Click Login button
5. Verify error message displays

**Expected Results**:
- Login fails
- Error message shows

---

#### TC-AUTH-006: Empty Credentials
**Priority**: Medium  
**Description**: Verify validation for empty login fields

**Steps**:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Leave username and password empty
3. Click Login button
4. Verify validation error messages

**Expected Results**:
- Form validation prevents submission
- Error messages indicate required fields

---

#### TC-AUTH-007: Logout Functionality
**Priority**: High  
**Description**: Verify user can logout successfully

**Steps**:
1. Login with valid credentials
2. Locate logout button/link
3. Click logout
4. Verify user is logged out
5. Verify redirect to home or login page

**Expected Results**:
- Logout succeeds
- User session ends
- Appropriate redirect occurs

---

### 3.6 UI/UX Tests

#### TC-UI-001: Theme Toggle - Dark Mode
**Priority**: Medium  
**Description**: Verify theme toggle to dark mode

**Steps**:
1. Navigate to any page
2. Note current theme (assume light mode)
3. Locate "Toggle theme" button
4. Click button
5. Verify page switches to dark mode
6. Verify dark theme applies to all elements

**Expected Results**:
- Theme toggle button is visible
- Click switches to dark mode
- All page elements use dark theme colors

---

#### TC-UI-002: Theme Toggle - Light Mode
**Priority**: Medium  
**Description**: Verify theme toggle to light mode

**Steps**:
1. Start in dark mode
2. Click "Toggle theme" button
3. Verify page switches to light mode

**Expected Results**:
- Toggle switches to light mode
- All elements use light theme colors

---

#### TC-UI-003: Theme Persistence
**Priority**: Low  
**Description**: Verify theme preference persists across pages

**Steps**:
1. Toggle to dark mode
2. Navigate to different section
3. Verify dark mode persists
4. Refresh page
5. Verify theme preference is saved (if implemented)

**Expected Results**:
- Theme persists across page navigation
- Theme preference may persist across sessions (localStorage/cookie)

---

#### TC-UI-004: Responsive Design - Mobile View
**Priority**: Medium  
**Description**: Verify site works on mobile viewport

**Steps**:
1. Resize browser to mobile dimensions (375x667)
2. Navigate through different sections
3. Verify layout adapts appropriately
4. Verify navigation menu (may be hamburger menu)
5. Verify content is readable

**Expected Results**:
- Layout adapts to mobile viewport
- All functionality remains accessible
- Text is readable without horizontal scrolling

---

#### TC-UI-005: Responsive Design - Tablet View
**Priority**: Low  
**Description**: Verify site works on tablet viewport

**Steps**:
1. Resize browser to tablet dimensions (768x1024)
2. Navigate through sections
3. Verify layout adapts appropriately

**Expected Results**:
- Layout adapts to tablet viewport
- Functionality remains intact

---

## 4. Test Data Requirements

### Shopping Section
- Product names for search testing
- Valid price ranges
- Expected product categories
- Known product ratings

### Authentication
- Valid test user credentials
- Invalid credentials for negative testing
- Special character testing data

### Web Elements
- Sample text inputs (various lengths)
- Multi-line text for textarea
- Expected dropdown values
- Table data for validation

---

## 5. Test Execution Strategy

### Priority Levels
1. **Critical**: Shopping cart, Login, Basic navigation
2. **High**: Filters, Sorting, Form submissions, API documentation
3. **Medium**: Theme toggle, Pagination, Code examples, Checkboxes/Radio buttons
4. **Low**: Responsive design, Table interactions

### Execution Order
1. Smoke tests (basic navigation and page loads)
2. Shopping application tests (core functionality)
3. Web elements tests
4. API section tests
5. Authentication tests
6. UI/UX tests

### Test Environment
- Development: Full test suite execution
- Staging: Critical and High priority tests
- Production: Smoke tests only

---

## 6. Defect Management

### Severity Levels
- **Blocker**: Login fails, Shopping cart doesn't work
- **Critical**: Filters don't work, Form submission fails
- **Major**: Pagination broken, Sorting incorrect
- **Minor**: Theme toggle issues, UI alignment
- **Trivial**: Typos, Minor visual issues

---

## 7. Success Criteria

- ✅ 95%+ test pass rate for Critical/High priority tests
- ✅ No blocker or critical defects open
- ✅ All major user flows function correctly
- ✅ Cross-browser compatibility verified
- ✅ Responsive design works on mobile/tablet

---

## 8. Risks and Mitigation

| Risk | Impact | Mitigation |
|------|--------|------------|
| Website unavailability | High | Implement retry logic, check status before tests |
| Element locator changes | High | Use robust locator strategies (ID, data attributes) |
| Network latency | Medium | Use appropriate explicit waits |
| Browser compatibility | Medium | Test on multiple browsers |
| Dynamic content loading | Medium | Implement explicit waits for dynamic elements |

---

## 9. Tools and Frameworks

- **Test Framework**: Pytest
- **WebDriver**: Selenium WebDriver
- **Browser**: Chrome (ChromeDriver)
- **Reporting**: Pytest HTML reports
- **CI/CD**: Can integrate with GitHub Actions, Jenkins, etc.
- **Version Control**: Git

---

## 10. Deliverables

1. Test plan document (this document)
2. Test scripts (Python + Pytest)
3. Test execution reports
4. Defect reports (if any)
5. Test summary report

---

## 11. Timeline

- **Test Planning**: Completed
- **Test Script Development**: 2-3 days
- **Test Execution**: 1 day
- **Defect Reporting & Retesting**: Ongoing
- **Final Report**: 1 day after completion

---

## 12. Notes

- This test plan is generated using Selenium MCP Server
- Test scripts should be maintained and updated as website evolves
- Regular regression testing recommended after any website updates
- Consider adding API testing for backend endpoints
- Performance testing may be added as separate test suite
